name: Little Firefighters demo test v1
description:
Controls:

  • W, A, S, D or arrow keys - move firetruck
  • Mouse - direction of firetruck

A demo of the game so far: 

  • Environment added
  • Controls of the firetruck

More to be added soon like:

  • Firefighter controls
  • NPCs
  • and more
